install.author: JoomlaStats Team
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2004-2009 JoomlaStats Team. All rights reserved.
install.description:
JoomlaStats Visitor Details Module - Shows visitor details like country, IP, OS, browser also in graphical way.

Visitor Details Module is extension to JoomlaStats component/engine (com_joomlastats).


Project JoomlaStats homepage http://www.joomlastats.org.
This Module (mod_jstats_visitordetails) homepage.

param.name: list_tld_images_dir
param.label: TLD images directory
param.description:
Choose image set for TLD (Top Level Domains)

To install more images, upload files to server to '(...)/joomla/components/com_joomlastats/images' directory.
Remember to create directory with appropriate name!

More image sets You will find in 'extra_images_v*.zip' package on JoomlaStats download page.

param.name: content_format
param.label: Content
param.description:
Enter translation here for 'country names'. Country names they will be replaced by texts defined here.

You can also use 'Translation tool' to provide shortcuted country name: 'United States of America' => 'USA'

eg.
de=Deutschland; nl=Niederlande; us=Vereinigte Staaten
'Germany' will be replaced by 'Deutschland', 'Netherlands' by 'Niederlande' and 'United States' by 'Vereinigte Staaten'

param.name: tld_translation_tool
param.label: Country translation tool
param.description:
Enter translation here for 'country names'. Country names will be replaced by texts defined here.

You can also use 'Translation tool' to provide shortcuted country name: 'United States of America' => 'USA'

eg.
de=Deutschland; nl=Niederlande; us=Vereinigte Staaten
'Germany' will be replaced by 'Deutschland', 'Netherlands' by 'Niederlande' and 'United States' by 'Vereinigte Staaten'

param.name: os_translation_tool
param.label: OS translation tool
param.description:
Enter translation here for 'Operating Systems'. OS names will be replaced by texts defined here.

You can also use 'Translation tool' to provide shortcuted OS name: 'Windows 2000' => 'Win2000'

eg.
Windows XP=Win XP; Windows Vista=Vista; Linux=We love Linux!
'Windows XP' will be replaced by 'Win XP', 'Windows Vista' by 'Vista' and 'Linux' by 'We love Linux!'

param.name: browser_translation_tool
param.label: Browser translation tool
param.description:
Enter translation here for Internet Browser. Browser names will be replaced by texts defined here.

You can also use 'Translation tool' to provide shortcuted browser name: 'Unknown Internet Browser' => 'Unknown'

eg.
FireFox=Firefox; Google Chrome=Chrome; Internet Explorer=IE
'FireFox' will be replaced by 'Firefox', 'Google Chrome' by 'Chrome' and 'Internet Explorer' by 'IE'
